org.apache.flink.storm.wrappers

类 SetupOutputFieldsDeclarer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.storm.wrappers.SetupOutputFieldsDeclarer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.storm.topology.OutputFieldsDeclarer

    class SetupOutputFieldsDeclarer
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.storm.topology.OutputFieldsDeclarer
    SetupOutputFieldsDeclarer is used by WrapperSetupHelper to determine the output streams and number of attributes declared by the wrapped spout's or bolt's declare(...)/declareStream(...) method.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> outputSchemas
      The number of attributes for each declared stream by the wrapped operator.
      (专用程序包) java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,org.apache.storm.tuple.Fields> outputStreams
      The declared output streams and schemas.
